suggest.ext-openssl: Can be used as a polyfill if libsodium is not installed
suggest.ext-mcrypt: Can be used as a polyfill if either libsodium and openssl are not installed (libsodium and openssl are more secure)
suggest.ext-ldap: Required to use LDAP as an identity provider
suggest.ext-posix: Not required by the core, but some extensions uses it.
suggest.ext-imap: Required by the extension "Mail to ticket automation"
